message.content:
Genetic Algorithms, Neural Networks. 

Genetic Algorithms: The paper proposes a real-valued genetic algorithm (GA) to optimize the number and positions of fuzzy prototypes. The GA acts on all of the classes at once and measures fitness as classification accuracy, allowing the system to profit from global information about class interaction. 

Neural Networks: The paper presents the concept of a receptive field for each prototype, which is used to replace the classical, fixed distance-based membership function by an infinite fuzzy support membership function. This new membership function is inspired by that used in the hidden layer of RBF networks.
